required_fields: All fields marked with an asterisk ( * ) are required.
provide_information: Providing your information as completely and accurately as possible will help speed up the completion of your Background Verification.
name_info: Please provide your name exactly as it appears on your current government-issued identification document such as your Passport, Driverâ€™s License or National Identification Document.
certify_no_middle_name: I certify that I do not have a Middle Name on my official identification document.
date_living_address: Date you started living at this address
this_is_my_name_column: I certify this is my current legal name, exactly as it is displayed on my government-issued identification document *
alias_info: Skip this section if you do not have any alias names. Please provide: Any other names appearing on government-issued identity documents where that name differs from your primary identity document; or A prior legal name which can include your birth surname or any official change to a legal name; or A name that you use in an 'official' capacity.
email_privacy_info: Taakd may occasionally need to contact you for clarification of items on your Background Verification. We will never share or sell your email address.
provide_phone_numbers: Please provide your phone numbers. You can add multiple phone numbers.
identification_info: Most public records are stored using your name and birth date, so providing this information allows us to accurately search these sources.
provide_education_info: Please provide your education and training information beginning with the most recent.
enter_name_of_school: Enter the name of your educational institution.
enter_field_of_study: Enter your field of study or major.
another_name_info: Do you have another name used during your education?
provide_employment_info: Please provide your employment history, beginning with the most recent. To add additional employers, click the "Add" icon.
required_name_of_your_employer: Name of Your Employer is required.
permission_to_contact: Do we have permission to contact this current employer?
issuing_salary: Does this employer issue your paycheck?
model_steps_instructions: Model steps instructions of Job Request
